ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: LKW  To:  Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 09:15 Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Enchanters ... skills. ...
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 09:15
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Enchanters


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Hi,
>
> > From: "Entreri" <drizzt@...>
> > U should never add Skillpoints to ya Fighting Skillz or anything that
> does
> > for combat.Because when U use it[like fighting an enemy],it increases
> pretty
> > fast so U dunt have to waste on them.Best should spend on
>
> Hmm, I spend 1 point each on every spell skill, and 1 point on some
skills.
> But they remain awkful and I cannot select them to use leh. Why sometime
> I spend 5 points on same skill (eg jewel crafting) yet cannot use the
skill
> (remain awkful). Also, sometime I also lost track which skill I put
points
> inside b4 coz they all look awkful ;(
>
Certain skills are used automatically. AS for ur jewel skill, it's used
when u attempt to fashion a jewellary with gem, precious metals and a mould
(eg ring)
As for Mediation, all u need to do is to start clicking on it once then u
can see ur mana really regenrating fast. It also helps in memorizing spells.


> Also, how can I train mediation? A lvl 11 wizard told me keep clicking
> mediating icon in the spell window. Isn't that very tedious - sit, open
> spell screen and keep on clicking on tat icon. Anyway I can make it a
> hotkey?
>
> > 1.NEW SKILLS[just add one point on it so u can USE it]
> > 2.Tradeskills[These are pretty hard to train, boring[Fishing],Waste time
> > :P,so best add here]
> > 3.OR Save for a higher level skill [Eg.Dual Wield or whatever magic]
>
> Also, what is the use of those misc skills like fletching, baking,
fishing,
> tailoring? When can we find the raw materials? Issit like UO need to
chop
> wood etc?
>

U don't need to chop ood for it. But u need to go buy the raw materials
for it. I think if I'm not wrong, the raw materials for fletching is at the
4th or 3rd inn at EC.

> > [PS:BTW I havent even installed it,and see,I DID my homework[EQ reserach
> :P]
> >
> > Entreri

> > >

> when
> > >I

> > >After

> > >
> > >Can rise fishing skill by merely fishing at pier? How u know ya skill
> max

> So
> > >far I cannot buy decent food/drink. I buy those grapes and wines and in
> the
> > >end dunno how to consume them ;(

> pant

too

> > >now. I
> > >> gave up on patchwork armours...too heavy.
> > >

> out
> > >my 2H blunt skill by using the stave to hunt all time, w/o using up
> > >practising point on it? When I rise a lvl, I use the points on some
> skills
> > >but yet it remain awkful, why? Now I use my skill points on those
> skills
> > >with the coin symbols - chanelling and alteration, is it ok?
> > >
> > >Any other skills which we shld practice more often to rise it rather
> than
> > >spending practice points on it? Can someone list some useful items
> which

> both
